content:
HTA has registered the following external code system owned by the AMA. The information on this page has been reviewed by the HTA, the Financial WG and the AMA. The process to have it accurately represented at terminology.hl7.org is in progress. To comment on the CPT code system, please do so on the corresponding JIRA ticket.

Current Procedural Terminology (CPT): https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=97453705

Thanks,
Carol
@Jessica Snell @Ted Klein
